column4: These 3TB partitions seem to be showing up properly now, but I'm still unable to create files or folders on them.  Someone suggested a permissions issue, but ls -l shows root root for both, which is identical to the two drives I AM able to successfully access fully
I'm using the GUI and the options are simply greyed out
make a dir on the fs via sudo mkdir then sudo chown the dir to be owned by.your user and try writing to it
